SEARCH
Package view.Doctor.availability

Class DoctorAvailabilityView

java.lang.Object
view.View
view.Doctor.availability.DoctorAvailabilityView
public class DoctorAvailabilityView extends View
DoctorAvailabilityView is a View that allows doctors to manage their availability.
Since:
2024-11-17

    • getViewName

      public String getViewName()
      Returns the name of the view.
      Specified by:
      getViewName in class View
      Returns:
      a String representing the view name, "Availability".
      See Also:
      • Navigator

    • render

      public void render()
      Renders the "Availability" view for the doctor.

      The rendering process includes:

      1. Displaying the general availability of the doctor.
      2. Displaying the specific availability of the doctor.
      3. Providing options to update general availability, update specific availability, clear availability, or go back.
      Specified by:
      render in class View
      See Also:
      • BuildContext
      • Column
      • Text
      • VSpacer
      • TextInput
      • Navigator
      • Widget
